ygData.subject: Re: Out of Office
ygData.msgSnippet: I can handle the bitching and moaning and all the other stuff that goes on in this mail list but this is getting on my nerves. Cant a hold be put on this
ygData.messageBody:
I can handle the bitching and moaning and all the other stuff that goes on
in this mail list but this is getting on my nerves. Cant a hold be put on
this address until he comes back and can stop this stuff?

At 06:28 PM 7/26/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: MFerrulo@...
>
>In a message dated 7/26/99 4:35:23 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
>jmceleney@... writes:
>
><<
> I will be out of the office from Monday July 26th and will return on
> Monday August 2nd. If you have a computing emergency, please contact
> Paul Leong at 630-979-5835.
>
> John McEleney
> Jmceleney@...
> Lucent Technologies Inc.
> Bell Labs Innovations
> 630-713-6656 >>
>
>
>Whos is this guy, and who cares?
>

>Solusek Ro
